content:
The MOV Main Directorate reported that on March 6, 2024, a temporarily occupied Berdyansk was liquidated by Samoilenko Samoilenko, which organized Pseudin Putin's pseudo -elections in the occupied territories of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisinformsGur MOU.

"After the enslavement of the city in 2022, the woman voluntarily cooperated with the Muscovites and received a place in the Russian occupation administration," the statement reads.

According to military intelligence, the so -called military commandant Berdyansk Colonel of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation Bardin "appointed" Svetlana Samoilenko to the post of "Deputy Mayor for Economics, Agrosector and Finance". The man and the adult son of a woman also serve the Russian invaders.

On the fact of cooperation Samoilenko Svetlana with the Russian occupation army, law enforcement agencies of Ukraine opened criminal proceedings under part 5 of Article 111-1 of the Criminal Code.

"In the framework of the preparation for Pseudin Putin, Svetlana Samoilenko sought to lies before the Muscovites: she intimidated and terrorized the Berdyans, forcing them to participate in an illegal fake vote," Gur noted.
title: In Berdyansk today the organizer of Pseudo -election of Putin - GUR is eliminated

author: Army Inform
